contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox_Company | company_name = Zeniel Co, Ltd. | company_logo = | company_type = [[Public companies|Public]] | company_slogan = Portal of People and Companies | foundation = 1990 | location = [[Seocho-gu]], [[Seoul]], [[Korea]] | key_people = [[Bak In Joo]], Management & CEO | num_employees = 5500 est. (2006) | products = [[List of Incruit services and tools]] | homepage = [http://www.zeniel.co.kr http://www.zeniel.co.kr] }} '''Zeniel Co, Ltd.''' ([[Hangul]]:제니엘) was [[Korea]]'s first corporate [[Service (economics)|service]] company. It is headquartered in Seocho-dong [[Seocho-gu]] [[Seoul]], [[Korea]] and was established in 1990. Zeniel employs over 5500 people and it operates a human resources media portal for the companies and for jobseekers. The company's [[CEO]] is Bak In Joo (박인주). ==Competitors== *[[Incruit]] *[[21 Agency Company]] ==See also== *[[Contemporary culture of South Korea]] ==External links== *[http://www.zeniel.co.kr Zeniel Homepage] (in Korean) [[Category:Service companies of South Korea]] [[Category:Companies established in 1990]] {{SouthKorea-company-stub}}
